color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette for the inner Spinner (unless using the default slot)
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)
size.description_zh: 以 CSS 单位为单位的大小，包括单位名称或标准大小名称 （xs|sm|md|lg|xl）

label.description: Add a label; Gets overriden when using the default slot
label.description_zh: 添加标签;使用默认插槽时被覆盖

label-class.description: Add CSS class(es) to the label; Works along the 'label' prop only
label-class.description_zh: 将 CSS 类添加到标签;仅适用于 'label' prop

label-style.description: Apply custom style to the label; Works along the 'label' prop only
label-style.description_zh: 将自定义样式应用于标签;仅适用于 'label' prop

transition-duration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slot is used for replacing default Spinner; Suggestions: a spinner or text
slots.description_zh: Default slot 用于替换默认微调器;建议：微调器或文本
